name: Williamsburg Bridge Banks
description: Raw street spot under the Williamsburg Bridge approach. Steep banks and crusty ledges — not for the faint of heart.
history: Old-school BK spot that's been sessioned since the early 2000s. Zoo York and DGK riders filmed here.
bestTimes: Anytime — it's under a bridge. Best on dry weekdays.
transitDirections: J/M/Z to Marcy Ave, walk toward the bridge.

detailedNotes.terrain: Features include banks, ledges, gaps, rough ground. Urban architecture repurposed for skating.
detailedNotes.culture: Part of the Brooklyn skate scene in Williamsburg. Old-school BK spot that's been sessioned since the early 2000s. Zoo York and DGK riders filmed here.
detailedNotes.tips: Best approach: J/M/Z to Marcy Ave, walk toward the bridge.. Anytime — it's under a bridge. Best on dry weekdays.
detailedNotes.warnings: Street spot — be respectful of the space and watch for security.
